title: Training Sessions
description: Create and manage your cohorts and learner groups

messages.demoDataDescription: Unable to connect to database. Showing simulated data.

create.title: Create a new cohort
create.confirmOpenEnrollment: Are you sure you want to open enrollment for this session?
create.confirmStartSession: Are you sure you want to start this session now?

errors.supabaseUnavailable: Supabase client unavailable. Unable to save.
errors.discountsWarning: Cohort was created, but discount creation failed.

generalInfo.title: General Information
generalInfo.mockDataWarning: Fictitious data is being used to allow you to continue.
generalInfo.demoModeDescription: You are currently using demonstration data.
generalInfo.readOnlySession: This section is read-only because the session is closed.
generalInfo.activeSessionWarning: Some fields cannot be modified because the session is active.
generalInfo.courseActiveWarning: The course cannot be modified once the session is active.
generalInfo.autoGenerateTitleDescription: The title will be automatically generated from the course name and start date.
generalInfo.autoGenerateTitleActiveWarning: This option cannot be modified once the session is active.
generalInfo.sessionTitleActiveWarning: The title cannot be modified once the session is active.
generalInfo.instructorsActiveWarning: Instructors cannot be modified once the session is active.
generalInfo.certificateDescription: Choose the certificate template to use for this cohort
generalInfo.noCustomTemplates: No custom templates available for this organization.
generalInfo.certificateTemplateDescription: This template will be used to generate learner certificates.
generalInfo.courseNoCertificate: The selected course does not allow certificate issuance.

communication.title: Communication
communication.welcomeMessageDescription: This message will be sent to learners when they join the session.
communication.endMessagePlaceholder: Message sent to learners at the end of the session...
communication.endMessageDescription: This message will be sent to learners at the end of the session.
communication.channelDescription: Choose the platform that will be used for group communications
communication.noChannel: Do not use external communication channel
communication.groupLinkDescription: Link to the discussion group for this cohort

planning.title: Session Planning
planning.readOnlySession: This section is read-only because the session is closed.
planning.activeSessionWarning: Some fields cannot be modified because the session is active.
planning.startDateActiveWarning: The start date cannot be modified once the session is active.
planning.endDateActiveWarning: The end date cannot be modified once the session is active.

participants.title: Participants
participants.errorOrganizationMessage: Check that your organization has enrolled learners or use the 'View all members' button to display all members of your organization.
participants.useInviteButton: Use the 'Invite' button to add participants
participants.noEnrollmentsYet: This cohort has no enrollments yet
participants.selectParticipantsMessage: Select participants from the list to add them to the cohort.
participants.minParticipantsDescription: The minimum number of participants required to start the session
participants.maxParticipantsDescription: The maximum number of participants allowed in the session
participants.customDeadlineDescription: Date after which registrations will no longer be accepted
participants.waitlistDescription: Allow learners to join a waitlist when the session is full
participants.manualApproval: Manual - You approve each registration request
participants.immediateAccessDescription: Allows participants to access content as soon as they register
participants.accessStartDescription: Date from which participants will have access to content
participants.accessEndDescription: Date after which participants will no longer have access to content
participants.nonInvitationMode: Non-invitation access mode: participant selection not available
participants.emailRequired: Email is required to invite a participant

pricing.freeDescription: This course is freely accessible. Participants in this cohort will have no fees to pay.
pricing.invitationOnlyDescription: This course requires a special invitation. Participants must be invited individually.
pricing.useCoursePriceDescription: Participants in this cohort will pay the same price as defined for the course
pricing.pricingOptionsDescription: Set prices and payment options for this cohort
pricing.promoCodesDescription: Define discount codes applicable to this cohort
pricing.name: Name
pricing.maxUsesDescription: Maximum number of times this promo code can be used

details.addInstructorHelp: Add an instructor on the fly without changing the session status.

deleteDialog.title: Are you sure you want to delete this cohort?
deleteDialog.description: This action cannot be undone. The data will be permanently deleted from our servers.

tooltips.cannotEditActive: Cannot edit an active session. Revert to draft first.

toasts.removeInstructorConfirm: Remove this instructor from the cohort?

errors.sessionNotFoundDescription: The session you are looking for does not exist or is not accessible.

nextSessionCard.title: Next session
nextSessionCard.description: Date and time of the next session

pricingCard.title: Pricing options and promo codes
pricingCard.description: Payment methods and discount codes available for this cohort
pricingCard.usesCoursePriceDescription: Participants pay the same price as defined for the course.
pricingCard.noPromoCodes: No promotional codes available for this cohort

sessionsTab.manageInfo: You can manage sessions without changing the cohort status.
sessionsTab.title: Cohort sessions
sessionsTab.noSessionsDescription: This cohort has no scheduled sessions yet
